page.title: 01LITTLE MILL DISTRICT
page.content: Little Mill and the surrounding area is mainly rural with mixed farming concerns_from dairy to crops.Deciduous trees and coniferous woods cover the hillsides. Three villages,Little Mill,Glascoed and Monkswood are the main residential areas,all with thriving communities. Houses and farms are scattered between these villages. Some farmland is owned by the Ministry of Defence as there is a defence establishment which provides much needed employment other than farming. The valley, running west to east conducts the main road to Usk town and this joins the valley through which the famous salmon fishing River Usk flows southwards. Various members of the local Womens Institute have given information about the area.
